title: Memories of Moomba
abstract: A selection of short films made in a Digital Storytelling workshop held to celebrate 50 years of the Moomba festival
description: A selection of short films made in a Digital Storytelling workshop held to celebrate 50 years ofthe Moomba festival. The stories explore the history of the parade and life as a sun queen of moomba. It traces the history of the well known carnival family, and highlights the achievements of the key figures involved in the wild and wacky water events. Memories of Moomba was produced in collaboration with  City of Melbourne and Melbourne Moomba Waterfest.
